synonyms.synonym: Sodium channel protein skeletal muscle subunit alpha
Sodium channel protein type IV subunit alpha
Voltage-gated sodium channel subunit alpha Nav1.4

protein.specific_function: This protein mediates the voltage-dependent sodium ion permeability of excitable membranes. Assuming opened or closed conformations in response to the voltage difference across the membrane, the protein forms a sodium-selective channel through which Na(+) ions may pass in accordance with their electrochemical gradient. This sodium channel may be present in both denervated and innervated skeletal muscle
